terms_intro: Welcome to the Tabiby App! These Terms of Use (the "Terms") constitute a legally binding agreement between you ("User" or "you") and Tabiby ("Company," "we," "us," or "our") regarding your use of the Tabiby mobile application and all related services (collectively, the "App").
terms_content_1: By accessing or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not use the App.
terms_content_2a: You must be at least [Minimum Age, e.g., 18] years old to use the App.
terms_content_2b: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account login information.
terms_content_3a: You agree to use the App only for lawful purposes.
terms_content_3b: Prohibited Activities include: unauthorized access, distributing viruses, or infringing on intellectual property rights.
terms_content_4: All content, features, and functionality of the App (including text, graphics, logos, and software) are the exclusive property of Tabiby and are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
terms_content_5a: The App is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind.
terms_content_5b: We are not liable for any direct, indirect, or incidental damages resulting from your use of the App.
terms_content_6: We may terminate or suspend your access to the App immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including a breach of these Terms.
terms_content_7: These Terms shall be governed by the laws of Tabiby.
privacy_welcome: Welcome! Your privacy is very important to us.
privacy_intro: This Privacy Policy explains how Tabiby (the "Company," "we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, discloses, and protects your information when you use the Tabiby mobile application (the "App").
privacy_list_1a: Registration data (name, email, phone number, etc.).
privacy_list_1b: Usage data (screens viewed, time spent in the App).
privacy_list_2a: To provide and maintain the App services.
privacy_list_2c: To process transactions and manage your account.
privacy_list_2d: For research, analytics, and service improvement.
privacy_list_2e: To communicate with you (e.g., updates, support).
privacy_list_3a: Service providers who perform services on our behalf (e.g., hosting, analytics).
privacy_list_3b: When legally required (e.g., to comply with a subpoena or court order).
privacy_content_4: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. However, no security system is impenetrable, and we cannot guarantee the security of our databases.
privacy_list_5a: You may update your account information at any time.
privacy_list_5b: You may opt-out of receiving promotional communications.
privacy_content_6: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy within the App.
privacy_content_7: If you have questions about this Policy, please contact us at: tabiby@gmail.com
about_content_mission: Our mission is to help you to get your appointments from your home. We strive to deliver an exceptional and reliable experience to every user.
about_content_team: We are a passionate team of developers, designers, and innovators dedicated to building the future of healthcare. We believe in transparency, innovation, and user-centric design.
about_content_vision: We envision Tabiby as the leading healthcare app globally, setting new standards for speed and security and constantly evolving to meet the needs of our growing user base.
contact_intro: We're here to help. Whether you have questions, feedback, or need support, please reach out to us using one of the methods below.
contact_desc_support: For technical issues, account help, or general inquiries.
contact_desc_media: For press releases, interviews, or partnership opportunities.
delete_account_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
